basics.name: Mai Tien Long
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a Master degree in Statistics and Machine Learning at the University of Paris Saclay. I expect to graduate in September, 2022.

education.institution: University of Paris Saclay, Gif-sur-Yvette, FR

highlights: Analyse data on automotive seats using causal inference, machine learning models and high dimensional visualisation tools
Read research papers and implement a model to predict quality of images using Pytorch

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
